Sentence: LONDON , May 9 ( AFP ) A ground-breaking British budget cinema chain launched by the founder of low-cost airline easyJet announced Friday that it had finally acquired some films to show -- just a fortnight before it first opens .

mentionArg2.extent: A ground-breaking British budget cinema chain launched by the founder of low-cost airline easyJet

mentionArg1.extent: the founder of low-cost airline easyJet

Sentence: LONDON , May 9 ( AFP ) A ground-breaking British budget cinema chain launched by the founder of low-cost airline easyJet announced Friday that it had finally acquired some films to show -- just a fortnight before it first opens .

EasyCinema founder Stelios Haji-Ioannou , who set up easyJet in 1995 and built it up into Europe 's biggest budget airline , has vowed to take legal action against the distribution firms unless they allow him access .

Sentence: EasyCinema founder Stelios Haji-Ioannou , who set up easyJet in 1995 and built it up into Europe 's biggest budget airline , has vowed to take legal action against the distribution firms unless they allow him access .

extent: A ground-breaking British budget cinema chain launched by the founder of low-cost airline easyJet

mentionArg1.extent: the founder of low-cost airline easyJet

Sentence: LONDON , May 9 ( AFP ) A ground-breaking British budget cinema chain launched by the founder of low-cost airline easyJet announced Friday that it had finally acquired some films to show -- just a fortnight before it first opens .

EasyCinema , which aims to sell tickets to its no-frills cinemas for as little as 20 pence ( 0.28 euros , 0.32 dollars ) , has been locked in a bitter battle with film distributors over how it wants to pay for titles .

extent: easyCinema's first outlet in Milton Keynes, just north of London, which is due to open its doors on May 23

mentionArg1.extent: easyCinema's first outlet in Milton Keynes, just north of London, which is due to open its doors on May 23

Sentence: The deadlock , and subsequent lack of any films , has been threatening to de-rail the debut of easyCinema 's first outlet in Milton Keynes , just north of London , which is due to open its doors on May 23 .

Sentence: However the firm announced on Friday that it had reached a deal with the British arm of French distributors Pathe to show four releases .

extent: the top six UK distributors representing more than 90 percent of the market

mentionArg1.extent: the top six UK distributors representing more than 90 percent of the market

Sentence: " The situation with the top six UK distributors representing more than 90 percent of the market is still in a deadlock , " he said .
" I have instructed my lawyers to discuss this issue with the Office of Fair Trading . "
